title: Save Your Tears
author: The Weeknd
lyrics:
[00:01.98] Ooh
[00:06.47] Na-na, yeah
[00:08.32] I saw you dancing in a crowded room (uh)
[00:12.92] You look so happy when I'm not with you
[00:16.77] But then you saw me, caught you by surprise
[00:21.36] A single teardrop falling from your eye
[00:24.94] I don't know why I run away
[00:30.52] 
[00:33.27] I make you cry when I run away
[00:41.41] You could've asked me why I broke your heart
[00:45.56] You could've told me that you fell apart
[00:49.58] But you walked past me like I wasn't there
[00:53.66] And just pretended like you didn't care
[00:58.25] I don't know why I run away
[01:03.90] 
[01:06.94] I make you cry when I run away
[01:14.84] Take me back 'cause I wanna stay
[01:18.70] Save your tears for another
[01:21.78] Save your tears for another day
[01:27.88] 
[01:30.14] Save your tears for another day (so)
[01:37.69] I made you think that I would always stay
[01:42.43] I said some things that I should never say
[01:46.48] Yeah, I broke your heart like someone did to mine
[01:51.11] And now you won't love me for a second time
[01:55.36] I don't know why I run away, oh, girl
[02:02.95] Said, I make you cry when I run away
[02:11.36] Girl, take me back 'cause I wanna stay
[02:15.42] Save your tears for another
[02:18.85] I realize that I'm much too late
[02:23.64] And you deserve someone better
[02:26.62] Save your tears for another day (oh yeah)
[02:33.64] Save your tears for another day (yeah)
[02:40.90] I don't know why I run away
[02:46.90] 
[02:53.10] I'll make you cry when I run away
[02:59.21] Save your tears for another day
[03:03.82] Ooh, girl, I said (ah)
[03:06.53] Save your tears for another day (ah)
[03:13.09] Save your tears for another day (ah)
[03:22.98] Save your tears for another day (ah)
[03:29.07]
